Line: Draco's plotting something, I know it, something to do with Voldemort.  He's been given a task or a mission -- and Snape was offering to help.

Line: Voldemort has chosen Draco Malfoy for a mission?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I know it sounds mad --

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Has it occurred to you, Harry, that Snape was simply pretending to offer Draco help so that he could find out what he's up to?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's not what it sounded like.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: Perhaps Harry's right, Remus.  To make an Unbreakable Vow, after all --

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: It comes down to whether or not you trust Dumbledore's judgement. He trusts Snape.  Therefore, I do.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But Dumbledore can make mistakes. He's said it himself --

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: You're blinded by hatred.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not --

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: You are!  People are disappearing, Harry.  Daily.  We can only put our trust in a handful of people. If we start fighting amongst ourselves, we're doomed.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Open up, you.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Don't trust me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's good.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: 'Course 'tis.  Made them myself.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: You'll have to forgive Remus.  It takes its toll -- his condition.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Are you alright, Mr. Weasley?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: We're being followed, all of us. Molly doesn't leave the house most days.  It's not been easy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Did you get my owl?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Yes, but I thought it best if I replied in person.  If Dumbledore's traveling, it's news to the Ministry.  But perhaps that's the way Dumbledore wants it.  As for Draco Malfoy -- I know a bit more.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Go on.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: I sent an agent to Borgin & Burkes.  From what you describe, I think what you and Ron saw at the end of the summer -- the object that Draco seemed so interested in -- was a Vanishing Cabinet.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: A Vanishing Cabinet?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: They were all the rage when Voldemort first rose to power. You can imagine the appeal. Should the Death Eaters come calling, one needed only slip inside and disappear for an hour or two.  But they're tricky contraptions.  Require a tremendous amount of looking after.  Eventually they fell out of favor.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What happened to it?  The one at Borgin & Burkes?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Nothing.  It's still there.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Harry.  You know, I went through all this before -- the last time around.  Times like these -- dark times -- do funny things to people.  It can bring them together and it can tear them apart.  Things... speed up.  It's what happens when you don't know if today will be your last.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: It was delicious, Molly.  Really.

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: You're sure you won't stay?

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: No, we should go. The first night of the cycle is always the worst --

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Remus...?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Everyone gone to bed?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Soon.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: I don't sleep these days.  So I wash my hair.  Silly, right?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Happy Christmas, Harry.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: Sweetheart...

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: There's someone out there.  I can smell him.  There's more than one --

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Oh my god...

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Harry, no!

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: Remus!

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: Ginny, stay with your mother!

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: No, Harry!  It's a trap!

Name: Fenrir Greyback
Line: Don't you smell clean.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You have to realize who you are, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I know who I am, Hermione, alright?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Sorry. So tell me what Arthur said.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: If Dumbledore's traveling places, it's news to the Ministry.  But get this:  that night at Borgin & Burkes?  It seems Draco was looking at a Vanishing Cabinet.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What would Draco want with a Vanishing Cabinet?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You tell me.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He looks different, don't you think?  Draco.  Almost... ill.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who could tell the difference?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Lav, c'mon. Of course I'll wear it.

Name: Lavender Brown
Line: That's my Won-Won.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Excuse me, I have to go vomit.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgeable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Intuition.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Good gracious, look at the time. Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I know a secret shortcut or two.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Go on.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic, and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I don't know anything about such things and I wouldn't tell you if I did!  Now get out of here at once and don't ever let me catch you mentioning it again!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Confused?  I would be surprised if you weren't.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't understand -- what happened?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This is perhaps the most important memory I've collected.  It's also a lie. This memory has been tampered with.  In this case by the person whose memory it is, our friend Professor Slughorn.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But why would he tamper with his own memory?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I suspect he is ashamed of it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Why indeed.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I asked you to get to know Professor Slughorn and you've done so.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Now I want you to persuade him to divulge his true memory.  Any way you can.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't know him that well, sir --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You're the Chosen One, Harry.  And Horace is, at heart, a decent man. Provide the proper circumstances and he will confess his sins.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This memory is everything, Harry. Without it, we are blind. Without it, we leave the fate of our world to chance.  You have no choice. You must not fail.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Now don't forget to look over the chapter on antidotes.  I'll be poisoning one of you next time we meet.  I'm joking!  Off you go! Don't forget your rattails, Miss Alys.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Ah! If it isn't the Prince of Potions himself!  To what do I owe the pleasure?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, sir, I wondered if I might ask you something.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Ask away, my dear boy, ask away!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, you see, the other day I was in the Restricted Section -- in the library -- and I stumbled upon something rather odd while reading.  Something about a bit of rare magic...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes?  And exactly what was this rare magic.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not sure... That is, I don't recall the name... exactly.  But it got me wondering... Are there some kinds of magic you're not allowed to teach?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I'm a Potions Professor, Harry. Perhaps your question would best be posed to Professor Snape.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, well, we don't exactly see eye-to-eye, sir.  What I mean to say is, he's not like you.  He might... misunderstand.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: There can be no light without the dark.  And so it is with magic. Myself, I have always strived to live within the light.  I suggest you do the same.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Did you say the same to Tom Riddle, sir?  When he came asking questions.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Dumbledore put you up to this. Didn't he?  Didn't he!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir --

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Dead. Did you actually expect you could just walk up to Ol' Sluggy and ask him to reveal his deepest, darkest secret?  Honestly, Harry, sometimes I think the Daily Prophet should call you the Dim One.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Nice.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You're going to have to persuade him somehow.  And now, I'm afraid, you've made it a lot harder.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione.  I think Malfoy's leaving the castle.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've seen it.  Sometimes... sometimes he just disappears off the Map.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's... not possible.  No one can leave the castle these days. The Map is wrong.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The Map is never wrong.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's beautiful, isn't it?  The moon.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Divine.  Had ourselves a little late-night snack, did we?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It was on your bed.  The box. Thought I'd try one...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Or twenty.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I can't stop thinking about her, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Really?  Honestly, I reckoned she was starting to annoy you.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: She could never annoy me.  I think... I think I love her.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well... Brilliant.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Do you think she knows I exist?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Bloody well hope so.  She's been snogging you for three months.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Snogging?  Who're you talking about?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who're you talking about?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Romilda, of course.  Romilda Vane.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay.  Very funny.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What the hell was that for?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's no joke!  I'm in love with her!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay!  Fine!  You're in love with her!  Have you ever actually met her!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No.  Can you introduce me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron, these chocolates, they're -- C'mon.  I'm going to introduce you to Romilda Vane.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: How do I look?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Devastatingly handsome.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Damn it all!

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes???!!!! Oh.  Potter.  It's you.  I'm afraid I'm busy at the moment --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir.  I'm sorry.  I wouldn't bother you if it weren't absolutely --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Where's Romilda?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: What's the matter with Wenby?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Ah.  Very well.  Bring him in.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I'd have thought you could whip up a remedy for this in no time, Harry -- an expert potioneer like you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I figured this called for a more practiced hand, sir.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hello, darling.  Fancy a drink?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Hm.  Perhaps you're right.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm sorry, sir.  About the other day.  Our... misunderstanding.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes, well, water under the bridge as they say, correct?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I mean, I'm sure you're tired of it, after all these years.  The questions.  About... Voldemort.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I'll ask you not to use that name.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, sir.  It's just, well, Dumbledore once said that fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.  It seemed sensible.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: With all due respect, Dumbledore sometimes forgets that most of us do not possess powers so great that we can risk offending the most dangerous Dark Lord who ever lived.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Alright, m'boy!  Bottoms up!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's this?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: A tonic for the nerves.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What happened to me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Love potion.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: And a bloody strong one at that.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I feel really... bad.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Pick-me-up's what you need, m'boy. Do us all good, I think.  I've got butterbeer, wine -- ah -- and a dazzling oak-matured mead.  I had other intentions for this but given the circumstances...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: There we are, Potter.  To life!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron!  Ron!!!  Professor, help him!

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I d-don't understand --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor!  Do something!!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's choking!!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Breathe!  C'mon, Ron, don't be a prat.  Breathe!  BREATHE!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: These girls are gonna kill me, Harry.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Quick thinking on your part, Harry.  Using a Bezoar.  You must be very proud of your student, eh, Horace?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Hm?  Oh.  Yes... very proud.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: I think we all agree that Mr. Potter's actions were heroic.  The question is:  Why were they necessary.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Why indeed.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This appears to be a gift, Horace. You don't by chance remember who gave you this bottle, do you -- which by the way possesses remarkably subtle hints of licorice and cherry when not polluted with poison.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Actually I had intended to give it as a gift myself.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: To whom might I ask?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: You, Headmaster.

Name: Lavender Brown
Line: Where is he?  Where's my Won-Won! Has he been asking for me? What's she doing here?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I might ask you the same.

Name: Lavender Brown
Line: I happen to be his girlfriend.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I happen to be his... friend.

Name: Lavender Brown
Line: Don't make me laugh.  You haven't spoken in weeks.  I suppose you want to make up with him now that he's suddenly all interesting.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He's been poisoned, you daft dimbo! And for the record, I've always found him interesting.

Name: Lavender Brown
Line: Ha!  See? He senses my presence. I'm here, Won-Won. I'm here --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Er... My... Nee... Er!  My!  Nee!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ah, to be young and feel love's keen sting.  Come, everyone, I think Mr. Weasley is well tended.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: 'Bout time, don't you think?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I've always cherished my students. They're my life...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh shut up.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ron.  Stop.  You're making it snow.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Huh?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Tell me again how I broke up with Lavender?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Um, well, she came to visit you in the hospital, you see, and you talked -- I don't believe it was a long conversation --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Don't get me wrong.  I'm bloody thrilled to be shot of her.  It's just she seems... a bit put out.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Does, doesn't she?  And you say you don't remember a thing from that night?  Not one thing?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Well... there is... something. But no.  It can't be.  Besides, I was completely boggled, wasn't I?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Right.  Boggled...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's Katie.  That's Katie Bell.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How are you, Katie?

Name: Katie Bell
Line: Give me a moment, girls.

Name: Katie Bell
Line: I know you're going to ask, Harry. But I don't know who cursed me. I've tried to remember.  Honestly. But I just... can't...

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Cruci--

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sectumsempra!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Don't touch me!  Don't you dare touch me!

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: You have to get rid of it.  Today.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Take my hand.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The Room of Requirement...

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Over the years, if someone had a secret, if they wanted to conceal something, this is where they came.  Some of these things are almost as old as the castle itself.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who showed you this?  First.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Fred and George.  First year.  I hid Tom Riddle's diary here for a time.  Wish I'd left it...

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: What was that?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: See, you never know what you'll find up here.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: All right.  Close your eyes.  That way you can't be tempted.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: There's something else.  Another secret of sorts.  One of mine...

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: That can stay hidden up here too, if you like.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: So.  Did you and Ginny do it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You know.  Hide the book.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh.  Yeah.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Still no luck with Slughorn, I take it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Say that again.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Well?  How do you feel?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excellent.  Really excellent.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Now remember.  Slughorn usually eats early, takes a short walk and then returns to his office.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Right.  I'm going down to Hagrid's.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What?  No, Harry -- you've got to go see Slughorn.  We have a plan --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No.  I've got a good feeling about going to Hagrid's.  I feel like it's the place to be tonight, know what I mean?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Trust me.  I know what I'm doing. Or at least Felix does.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Merlin's beard, Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry, sir.  I should've announced myself.  Cleared my throat. Coughed.  You probably feared I was Madam Sprout.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Well, yes, actually -- Why would you think that?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Just the general behavior, sir. The sneaking around.  The jumping when you saw me.  By the way, those Tentacula leaves -- they're quite valuable, aren't they?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Ten galleons a leaf to the right buyer -- not that I'm familiar with such back alley transactions. One hears rumors is all.  My own interests are purely academic, of course.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Personally, these plants have always kind of freaked me out.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Exactly how did you get out of the castle, Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Through the front doors, sir.  I'm off to Hagrid's, you see.  He's a very dear friend and I felt like paying him a visit.  So if you don't mind, I'll be going.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: It's nearly nightfall.  Surely you realize I can't allow you to roam the grounds all by yourself.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, then by all means come along, sir.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Harry, I must insist you accompany me back to the castle immediately!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That would be counterproductive, sir.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: And what makes you say that?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No idea.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Merlin's beard...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Is that an actual Acromantula?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: A dead one, I think, sir.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: 'Arry.  'Orace.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: My god, dear man.  How did you ever manage to kill it?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Kill 'im! Me oldest friend, 'e was!

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I'm sorry, I... didn't realize.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Ah, don' worry yerself.  Yer not alone.  Seriously misunderstood creatures -- spiders.  It's the eyes, I reckon.  Unnerve people.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not to mention the pincers.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: I reckon that too... How'd yeh get outta the castle anyways?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Through the front doors.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Hagrid.  I wouldn't want to be indelicate, but Acromantula venom is uncommonly rare and, well, if you wouldn't mind my extracting a vial or two -- purely for academic pursuits...

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Don' suppose it's doin' 'im any good, izzit?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: My thoughts exactly!  Always carry a few spare ampoules for just such occasions.  Old Potion Master's habit, you know...

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Wish yeh coulda seen 'im in 'is prime.  Magnificent 'e was.  Jus' magnificent...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Why don't I say a few words?  I trust he had family?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh yeah.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Farewell...

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Aragog.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Farewell, Aragog, king of arachnids.  Though your body will decay, your spirit lingers on in the quiet, web-spun places of your Forest home.  May your many-eyed descendents ever flourish and your human friends find solace for the loss they have sustained.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Tha' was... tha' was... beautiful.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: And Odo the hero, they bore him back home...

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: To the place he'd known as a lad, They laid him to rest with his hat inside out and his wand snapped in two, which was sad...

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: I had 'im from an egg, yeh know. Tiny little thing he was when he hatched.  No bigger'n a Pekinese.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Sweet.  I once had a fish. Francis.  Lovely little thing. One day I came downstairs and he'd vanished.  Poof.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Tha's odd.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Isn't it?  That's life, I suppose. One goes along and then... poof.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: That's never unicorn hair, Hagrid?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Hagrid looks up, reels a bit.  Nods.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: But my dear chap, do you know how much that's worth?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No idea... no idea at all...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: It was a student who gave me Francis.  One spring afternoon I discovered a bowl upon my desk with a few inches of clear water. There was a flower petal floating upon the surface.  As I watched, the petal sank, but just before it touched bottom... it transformed. Into a wee fish.  It was beautiful magic, wondrous to behold.  The petal had come from a lily.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Your mother.  The day I came downstairs, the day I found the bowl empty... was the day she...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I know what you want.  But I can't give it to you.  It will ruin me...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you know why I survived?  The night I got this.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because of her.  Because she sacrificed herself.  Because she refused to step aside.  Because her love was more powerful than Voldemort.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Please don't say his --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not afraid of the name, Professor.  And I'm not afraid of him.  And you shouldn't be either. She didn't just die for me that night.  She died for you too.  She died for everyone who's ever woken in the middle of the night afraid a Death Eater waited on their doorstep.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor.  I'm going to tell you something, something others have only guessed at.  It's true.  I am the Chosen One.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Only I can kill him.  But in order to do so, I need to know what Tom Riddle asked you that night in your office all those years ago. And I need to know what you told him.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Be brave, Professor.  Be brave like my mother.  Otherwise you disgrace her.  Otherwise she died for nothing.  Otherwise, the bowl remains empty forever.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Don't think too badly of me once you've seen it.  You don't know what he was like... even then.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: How is he?  Horace?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Intuition.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Good gracious, is it that time already?  Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I know a secret shortcut or two.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other Professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Go on.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me.  It's called, as I understand it... a Horcrux.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Excuse me?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Horcrux.  I came across the term while reading and I didn't fully understand it.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I'm not sure what you were reading, Tom, but that's very Dark stuff, very Dark indeed.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, sir.  Which is why I came to you.  I mean no disrespect to the rest of the staff, but I thought if anyone could tell me... it would be you.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: A Horcrux is an object in which a person has concealed part of their soul.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, I thought it might be something like that.  But I don't understand how that works, sir.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: One splits one's soul and hides part of it in an object.  By doing so, you are protected should you be attacked and your body destroyed.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Protected?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: That part of your soul that was hidden, lives on.  In other words, you cannot die.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: How does one split his soul, sir?

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: I think you can guess the answer to that, Tom.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Murder.

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Yes.  Killing rips the soul apart. It is a violation against nature. After, one is never the same.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Out of curiosity, sir -- can you only split your soul once?  For instance, isn't seven the most powerfully magical number --

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: Seven!  Merlin's beard, Tom! Isn't it bad enough to think of killing one person?  To rip the soul into seven pieces...

Name: Horace Slughorn
Line: This is all hypothetical, isn't it, Tom?  All academic...

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Of course, sir.  And I promise I'll not speak of our conversation.  It'll be our little secret...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This is beyond anything I imagined.  In my life I have seen things that are unimaginably horrific.  I know now... you will see worse.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you mean to say he succeeded, sir?  In making a Horcrux?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh he succeeded.  And not just once.  Think, Harry.  He's just told us.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Seven.  He made seven -- the most powerfully magical number.  But... what are they exactly?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: They can be anything.  The most commonplace of objects.  A ring, for example.  Or a book...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Tom Riddle's diary --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It's a Horcrux, yes.  Four years ago, when you saved Ginny Weasley's life in the Chamber of Secrets, when you brought me this I knew.  This was a different kind of magic.  Very dark.  Very powerful.  But until tonight, I had no idea just how powerful...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And the ring...?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Belonged to Voldemort's mother. It was difficult to find and...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: ... even more difficult to destroy. But if you could find them all. If you did destroy each Horcrux...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: One destroys Voldemort.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But how would you find them?  They could be hidden anywhere, couldn't they...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: True.  But magic, especially Dark magic...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: ... leaves traces.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's where you've been going, isn't it, sir?  When you leave the school.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.  And I think... perhaps... I may have found another.  But this time I cannot hope to destroy it alone.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Once again, I shall ask too much of you.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry.  It's time.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione, is the Room of Requirement unplottable?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: If one wants it to be.  Why?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It would explain why I thought Malfoy was leaving the castle when he disappeared off the Map.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He was going to the Room of Requirement.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Of course, and that explains the Vanishing Cabinet as well!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No.  I got an owl from Dad this morning.  The one at Borgin & Burke's?  It's still there.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I'm telling you.  I saw it --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What if there are two?  Vanishing cabinets.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What if there are?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't know...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Good luck, mate.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't need luck.  I'll be with Dumbledore.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Have you ever considered that you ask too much?  That you take too much for granted?  Has it ever crossed your brilliant mind that I don't want to do this anymore?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Whether it has or hasn't is irrelevant.  I will not negotiate this with you, Severus.  You agreed.  There's nothing more to discuss.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Harry.  You need a shave, my friend.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: At times I forget how much you've grown.  At times I still see the small boy from the cupboard. Forgive my mawkishness, Harry.  I am an old man.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You look the same to me, sir.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Like your mother, you are unfailingly kind.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: A trait people never fail to undervalue.  I'm afraid.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The place to which we journey tonight is exceedingly dangerous, Harry.  I promised that you could accompany me and I stand by that promise.  But there is a condition:  You must obey any command I give you -- without question.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Understand what I'm saying. Should I tell you to hide, you must hide.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Should I tell you to run, you will run.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And should I tell you to abandon me and save yourself...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You will do so.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Your word, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: My word.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Take my arm.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, I thought one couldn't Apparate within Hogwarts.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Being me has its privileges.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's there, isn't it?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This is the place.  Oh yes, this place has known magic. Where you stand, Harry, Tom Riddle once stood many, many years ago, when he was but a poor orphan boy with a penchant for cruelty...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: One wintry afternoon, he lured two younger classmates to this cave. What happened is unclear.  But this much is known:  the children were damaged.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: In order to gain passage, payment must be made, payment intended to weaken any intruder.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You should've let me, sir.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh, no, Harry.  Your blood is much more precious than mine.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Careful.  The water.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It's there.  The only question is how do we get to it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We couldn't, perhaps, just try a Summoning Charm, sir?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Accio Horcrux!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Perhaps not.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: If you would, Harry...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir... have you ever taken Felix Felicis?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Only recreationally.  You see, I believe one creates one's own luck.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor... there are bodies in this lake.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Remember... the water.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you think the Horcrux is in there, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh yes.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It has to be drunk.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You remember the condition on which I brought you with me? This potion might paralyze me.  It might cause me to forget why I'm here.  It might create so much pain I beg for relief.  You are not to indulge these requests, Harry.  It is your job to make sure I keep drinking this potion even if you have to force it down my throat.  Understood?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why can't I drink it, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Because I am much older, much cleverer... and much less valuable. Your good health, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor?  Can you hear me?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Don't... don't make me...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You... you can't stop, Professor. You've got to keep drinking.  Like you said.  Remember.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Nooooooo!!!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Make it stop... Please... make it stop...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It will, sir.  It'll stop.  But only if you drink...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: My fault.  It's all my fault...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Too much... I can't... take it... I want... to die... kill... kill me... KILL ME, HARRY!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Your word, Harry!  Your word!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Kill me!  It's the only way!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: One more.  Just one more.  And then -- I promise... I'll do what you say.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I promise.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Water. Water...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Aguamenti.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You did it, sir.  Look --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Water!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm trying, sir.  I'm --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Go...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: We have to... go.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't worry, sir.  We're nearly there.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I am not worried, Harry.  I am with you.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: To your Houses.  No dawdling.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We need to get you up to the hospital, sir, to Madam Pomfrey --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: No.  Severus... Severus is who I need... Go and wake him... Tell him what has happened...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Speak to no one else... I... I shall wait here...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: All right.  Okay.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, are you... praying?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: No, Harry.  I do not pray.  I was merely closing a window -- the one that had allowed us to Apparate.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Hide yourself below.  And do not speak or show yourself without my permission.  No matter what.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Do as I say, Harry.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Trust me.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Good evening, Draco.  What brings you out on such a fine Spring evening?  Or is it Summer?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Who else is here?  I heard you talking.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I often talk aloud to myself.  I find it extraordinarily useful. That which sounds sane at a whisper can seem utterly mad when said for all the world to hear. Haven't been whispering to yourself, have you, Draco?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You are not an assassin, Draco.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: How do you know what I am?  I've done things that would shock you.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Like cursing Katie Bell and hoping she would, in turn, bear a cursed necklace to me?  Like replacing a bottle of mead with one laced with poison.  Forgive me, Draco, but these are attempts so feeble I cannot help but question if your heart has been really in them. I'm curious.  When Voldemort gave you this task, when he asked you to kill me, was it in a whisper?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: He trusts me!  I was chosen!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Then I shall make it easy for you.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Expelliarumus!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Well done, Draco.  But I warn you. Killing is not nearly as easy.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You're not alone.  Are you.  There are others.  How?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: The Vanishing Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: That cabinet has been broken for years.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I've been mending it.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ingenious.  Let me guess.  It has a sister.  A twin.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: In Borgin & Burkes.  They form --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: A passage, yes.  Very good. I once knew a boy years ago who made all the wrong choices.  Let me help you, Draco.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I don't want your help!  Don't you see!  I have to do it!  I have to! I've got to kill you or he'll kill me.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Say that again, Draco.  But aloud this time.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Well now, look what we have here. Dumbledore.  Wandless and alone.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Cornered in his own castle.  Well done, Draco.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Good evening, Bellatrix.  I think introductions are in order.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Love to, Albus.  But I'm afraid we're on a bit of a tight schedule.

Name: Fenrir Greyback
Line: Do it.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: He doesn't have the stomach.  Like his father.  Let me finish him. In my own way.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: No!  The Dark Lord was clear.  The boy's to do it.  Go on, Draco. Now!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: No.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Severus...

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Well, look who's here.  Hogwarts own Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.  Come to see the slaughter?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Severus... please.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: I gave my word.  I made a vow...

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Avada Kedavra!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You can no longer stay here.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Boo.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Draco!  Draco! They'll kill you if you stay.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Go on!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Go on!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Cruciatus!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Incacerata!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Impedimenta!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Fight!  Fight back, you coward!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Don't ever associate that word and my name again.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: No!  He belongs to the Dark Lord!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sectumsempra!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You dare use my own spells against me, Potter?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You may have gotten your mother's eyes, but you're as dim as your father.  Yes.  It's me.  I'm the Half-Blood Prince.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid... HAGRID!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid!  You alright?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Take more'n tha' ter finish me off.  Not sure about me 'ouse, tho'.  But if anybody can put it righ', Dumbledore can.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid, Dumbledore --

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Only thing I can't reckon is wha' Snape was doin' with tha' lot.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: An' wha's this wi' the Dark Mar'? Who's been killed? Where's Dumbledore, 'arry? Where's Dumbledore!!

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Potter.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Potter, in light of what's happened... should you feel the need to talk to someone...

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: You should know... Professor Dumbledore...

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: You meant a great deal to him.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Dumbledore.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you think he would've done it. Draco?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No.  He was lowering his wand.  In the end, it was Snape.  It was always Snape.  And I did nothing...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Strange.  Thinking this is a piece of Voldemort's soul...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah, strange.  Only... it's not. It's a fake.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Go on.  Open it.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: 'To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this but I want you to know that it was I who discovered your secret.  I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can.  I face death in the hope that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once more.  R.A.B.'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dunno.  But whoever they are, they have the real Horcrux.  Which means, it was a waste.  All of it.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ron's okay with it, you know.  You and Ginny.  But if I were you, when he's around, I'd keep the snogging to a minimum.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not coming back, Hermione.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We reckoned -- Ron and me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I have to finish what Dumbledore started. I'm not sure where that will lead me... but I'll let you and Ron konw where I am -- when I can.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I've always admired your courage, Harry, but sometimes... you're really thick.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You don't honestly think you can find all those Horcruxes by yourself, do you? You need us, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah.  I do.  But do me a favor. When I'm around?  Keep the snogging to a minimum.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Like that's going to happen.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Besides, he's barking.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Funny, he says the same about you.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Yes, but I'm exceptionally perceptive.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're brilliant.  You both are.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Do you think we'll ever... come back?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I dont know. I never realised how beautiful this place was.
